verses.verse: A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> listens to his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> but a <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H8085>doesn't<s%> listen to <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>
By the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>lips,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> enjoys <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2555>things;<s%> but the unfaithful crave violence.
He who <S%H5341>guards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H5341>guards<s%> his <S%H5315>soul.<s%> One who opens <S%H6589>wide<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> comes to <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H183>desires,<s%> and has <S%H5315>nothing,<s%> but the desire of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> shall be fully <S%H1878>satisfied.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H1697>lies,<s%> but a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man brings <S%H2659>shame<s%> and <S%H887>disgrace.<s%>
<S%H6666>Righteousness<s%> <S%H5341>guards<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> but <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H2403>sinner.<s%>
There <S%H3426>are<s%> some who pretend to be <S%H6238>rich,<s%> yet have <S%H7326>nothing.<s%> There are some who pretend to be poor, <S%H3605>yet<s%> have <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1952>wealth.<s%>
The <S%H3724>ransom<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H5315>life<s%> is his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> but the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> no <S%H1606>threats.<s%>
The <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shines <S%H8055>brightly,<s%> but the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is snuffed <S%H1846>out.<s%>
<S%H2087>Pride<s%> only <S%H5414>breeds<s%> <S%H4683>quarrels,<s%> but with ones who take <S%H3289>advice<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> gained <S%H1892>dishonestly<s%> <S%H4591>dwindles<s%> <S%H6908>away,<s%> but he who gathers by <S%H3027>hand<s%> makes it <S%H7235>grow.<s%>
<S%H8431>Hope<s%> <S%H4900>deferred<s%> makes the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2470>sick,<s%> but when <S%H8378>longing<s%> is <S%H935>fulfilled,<s%> it is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Whoever <S%H936>despises<s%> <S%H1697>instruction<s%> will <S%H2254>pay<s%> for <S%H3373>it,<s%> but he who respects a <S%H4687>command<s%> will be <S%H7999>rewarded.<s%>
The <S%H8451>teaching<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is a <S%H4726>spring<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> to <S%H5493>turn<s%> from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H2896>Good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> <S%H5414>wins<s%> <S%H2580>favor;<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H898>unfaithful<s%> is <S%H386>hard.<s%>
Every <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H6213>acts<s%> from <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> but a <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H6566>exposes<s%> <S%H200>folly.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into <S%H7451>trouble,<s%> but a <S%H529>trustworthy<s%> <S%H6735>envoy<s%> gains <S%H4832>healing.<s%>
<S%H7389>Poverty<s%> and <S%H7036>shame<s%> come to him who <S%H6544>refuses<s%> <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> but he who <S%H8104>heeds<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%> shall be <S%H3513>honored.<s%>
<S%H8378>Longing<s%> <S%H1961>fulfilled<s%> is <S%H6149>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> but <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8441>detest<s%> <S%H5493>turning<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
One who <S%H1980>walks<s%> with <S%H2450>wise<s%> men grows <S%H2449>wise,<s%> but a <S%H7462>companion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> suffers <S%H7321>harm.<s%>
<S%H7451>Misfortune<s%> <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> but <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> <S%H7999>rewards<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

A <S%H2896>good<s%> man leaves an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children,<s%> but the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> is <S%H6845>stored<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
An <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H400>food<s%> is in <S%H7218>poor<s%> <S%H5215>people<s%>'s fields, <S%H3808>but<s%> <S%H4941>injustice<s%> sweeps <S%H3426>it<s%> <S%H5595>away.<s%>
One who <S%H2820>spares<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> but one who <S%H157>loves<s%> him is <S%H7836>careful<s%> to discipline <S%H4148>him.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5315>one<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> to the <S%H7648>satisfying<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> but the <S%H990>belly<s%> of the wicked goes <S%H7563>hungry.<s%>
